889320.name: Цветок
889320.description:
An interactive story about a scientist who was spoken to by his experimental plant. You are in a room in one of the multi-storey buildings. Communicate with the flower, take care of it, and make choices at certain points in the game.

Key Features:

  • Various interactive content. You will be offered various options for interacting with the story.

  • The choice of ending is influenced not by specific decisions, but by the general attitude to what is happening.

  • The original music and style will easily immerse you in its atmosphere.

  • It's short. You can easily complete the game in one evening and enjoy the story.
889320.supported_languages: 俄语, 英语, 日语
